name: node-uuid
description: Rigorous implementation of RFC4122 (v1 and v4) UUIDs.
author: Robert Kieffer <robert@broofa.com>

scripts.build-v1:
sectionify --header '// AUTO-GENERATED - DO NOT EDIT

' uuid.js v1 > uuid-v1.js
scripts.build-v4:
sectionify --header '// AUTO-GENERATED - DO NOT EDIT

' uuid.js v4 > uuid-v4.js
